description: Salomon's RC 10 eSKIN Vitane feature a brand-new Stringer Core to give women lighter and more performant classic skis. The eSKINGRIP+ insert delivers precise, secure and silent grip, while the Shift binding makes it easy to adjust it and fine-tune the performance of your skis. Delivered in pack, slide on the binding and go! <br><br>Push boundaries with gear that matches your expertise. Our high-performance skis deliver optimal glide and acceleration. Responsive boots offer superior energy transfer, while advanced bindings provide micro-adjustments. Elevate your experience with top-tier gear that lets you excel on any terrain.<br><br>Enhance classic skiing with skin grip innovation. Mohair/synthetic skin in grip zone for excellent traction and glide. Reliable propulsion on any terrain and snow type. Embrace hassle-free, high-performance skiing.<br>
name: RC10 eSkin Vitane Hard + Prolink Shift - Set

specs.key: Master diagonal strides on all terrains with Classic equipment
specs.value: Long, grippy Classic Skis for reliable traction. Flexible Boots for effective striding. Stable Bindings for controlled pivoting. Elevate your classic skiing journey!
Developed in collaboration with our athletes, this extremely polyvalent grind provides you with the fastest glide available
The ski's base is digitally measured after grinding to ensure outmost precision and performance
These skis are delivered pre-waxed with the universal fluor-free wax from Swix. * Simply scrap the wax off the base and instantly enjoy a more sustainable glide!
Our high-quality production process enables you to select the exact ski you need based on your bodyweight
Parallel sidecut that helps skis track straight and fast
Our latest classic racing concept is designed to amplify kick and acceleration. It offers ideal press adjustment, especially in universal snow conditions
Digital control of the molding press enables the generation of optimal flex and camber for specific performance on snow. D2FC ensures also perfect ski pairing
World Cup base delivering maximum performance in universal conditions
The reverse fishbone-shaped Stringer Core minimizes the volume of raw material used in the ski’s core, while maintaining the structural integrity and torsional rigidity of the ski
100% MOHAIR skin with equal balance of grip and glide. You can switch it manually if you want to use the eSKINRACE to get into racing mode!
